thought: I have a crimson_stem at slot 44, which can be crafted into crimson_planks, which can then be crafted into a crimson_sign. I will move the crimson_stem to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I have crafted the crimson_planks, so I will move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: The current goal is to craft a crimson_sign. This requires crafting 9 crimson_planks. I have 4 crimson_planks in slot 11, so I need to craft more. I have 1 crimson_stem in slot 44, which I can use to craft more crimson_planks. So I will move the crimson_stem from slot 44 to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
